title: As a User, I want to View a Staff Profile
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/11731684/WBC+Staff+Profile|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/11731684/WBC+Staff+Profile|smart-link] 

AC:

* Names of staff members will appear as blue hyperlinks, in both the staff list section and the individual staff sections
* Clicking the hyperlink will take the user to the staff memberâ€™s profile
* The profile will follow the same basic layout as the player profile, but with different required fields (note the data discovery)

title: As a user I want to be asked to Confirm I want to cancel changes
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://zpl.io/2v6GdrQ|https://zpl.io/2v6GdrQ]

AC:

* Clicking *Cancel* anywhere in the system should trigger the global â€œAre you sure?â€￾ modal
* Never before saved profiles should act different and will be handled in this story [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/WBCP-135|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/WBCP-135|smart-link]

title: As a User, I want to download documents that have been uploaded to the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Provisional Roster: [https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW|https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW]

h6. _Note: This story covers the section on the Qualifying Rosters tab and not the Rosters tab, as depicted in the wireframe.  Both tabs will have the same sections._

AC:

* When viewing the Provisional Roster, there will be a paper clip icon in the NPPA and PPA columns (staff vs players)
* Clicking the paper clip icon will download all the attached documents

title: As a Team Admin User, I want to upload an NPPA to a staff member on the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Provisional Roster: [https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW|https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW]

h6. _Note: This story covers the section on the Qualifying Rosters tab and not the Rosters tab, as depicted in the wireframe.  Both tabs will have the same sections._

AC:

* Clicking on the Options Icon on a staff member's row, will launch the options menu, as depicted in the wire
* On the options menu, "NPPA" will be an option
* Clicking NPPA will launch the upload modal
* You will be able to drag and drop file attachments to the modal
* You will be able to click Browse and open a file browser to attach files
* You will be able to attach multiple files
* There will be a trash can icon for each file attached
** Clicking the trash can will remove the file
* There will be a required label field for attached files
* Label option will be:
** NPPA
** Other
* Labelâ€™s may be used more than once
* When a label has been added for all attached files, the Save Documents button will become active
* Clicking save documents will attach the files and commit changes, dismiss the modal, and return a green confirmation message
* Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm they wish to discard their changes
** If they confirm the decision, their changes will be discarded and the form will reload in view mode
** If they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.
* Uploaded docs will also be available on the staff memberâ€™s profile in the attached files section

title: As a User, I want to remove a Staff Member from the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Provisional Roster: [https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW|https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW]

h6. _Note: This story covers the section on the Qualifying Rosters tab and not the Rosters tab, as depicted in the wireframe.  Both tabs will have the same sections._

AC:

* Clicking on the options icon will reveal a remove staff option
* Clicking remove staff will remove the staff member from the provisional roster and indicate there are unsaved changes on the form
* The staff member will once again appear in the staff list

title: As a User, I want to see Coaching Staff Minimums called out on the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Provisional Roster: [https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW|https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW]

h6. _Note: This story covers the section on the Qualifying Rosters tab and not the Rosters tab, as depicted in the wireframe.  Both tabs will have the same sections._

AC:

* Each of the staff sections on the Provisional Roster will display the minimum number of staff needed (set in system settings), as depicted in the wire
* The minimum number will turn red if the minimum is not met

title: As a Team Admin User, I want to add staff to my Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Provisional Roster: [https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW|https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW]

h6. _Note: This story covers the section on the Qualifying Rosters tab and not the Rosters tab, as depicted in the wireframe.  Both tabs will have the same sections._

AC:

* Users will be able to click and drag Staff Members from the list to the Provisional Roster sections
* Adding them to the roster will removed them from the staff list

title: As a User, I want to save a Staff Profile
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):* 

Staff Profile: TBD

Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/11731684/WBC+Staff+Profile|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/11731684/WBC+Staff+Profile|smart-link] 

AC:

* When viewing a staff profile, there will be Save and Cancel buttons
* If the form is clean, the buttons will be disabled
* If the form is dirty, the buttons will be active
* Clicking Save will run a required field check and, if it passes, commit any changes made
* Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their action

title: As a Team Admin User, I want to create a new staff member
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Provisional Roster: [https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW|https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW]

Creating a Staff Member: TBD

h6. _Note: This story covers the section on the Qualifying Rosters tab and not the Rosters tab, as depicted in the wireframe.  Both tabs will have the same sections._

AC:

* There will be a â€œCreate Coaching Staff Memberâ€￾ button at the bottom of the staff list, as depicted in the provided wire
* If the Qualifying Rosters tab is dirty when the button is clicked, a modal will be displayed prompting the user to save changes before continuing:
** *Text:* You have unsaved changes that will be lost without saving.
** *Buttons:* Save and Continue, Cancel 
* Choosing Save and Continue will bring the user to a new, blank staff profile page
* If the Qualifying Rosters tab is dirty when the button is clicked, the user will be taken to a new, blank staff profile page

title: As a Team Admin User, I want to view a list of my staff next to the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Provisional Roster: [https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW|https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW]

h6. _Note: This story covers the section on the Qualifying Rosters tab and not the Rosters tab, as depicted in the wireframe.  Both tabs will have the same sections._

AC:

* There will be a staff list in the Provisional section of the Qualifying Roster tab, as depicted in the provided wire
* The list will be populated with all staff associated with the country being viewed
* There will be a select2 search to help find staff in the list

title: As a User, I want to view the staff portion of the Provisional Roster section on the Qualifying Roster tab
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Provisional Roster: [https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW|https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW]

h6. _Note: This story covers the section on the Qualifying Rosters tab and not the Rosters tab, as depicted in the wireframe.  Both tabs will have the same sections._

AC:

* There will be a staff section added to the Provisional Roster Portion of the Qualifying Roster tab
* There will be three sub sections, one for each of the following:
** Managers
** Coaches
** Trainers
* The layout will match the provided wireframe
* Each section will have the max number of rows (set in system settings)

title: As a BOC User, I want to set parameters for Coaching Staff on the System Settings Page
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

System Settings: [https://zpl.io/aw6oonM|https://zpl.io/aw6oonM]

AC:

* In the Qualifying Tournament section on the System Settings Menu, Min and Max fields will appear for the following:
** Managers
** Coaches
** Trainers
* The layout will match the provided wire
* All fields will be required
* Defaults will be as followed:
** Managers
*** Min: 1
*** Max: 2
** Coaches
*** Min: 2
*** Max: 6
** Trainers
*** Min: 1
*** Max: 4

title: As a Team Admin User, I want to upload documents to a player on my Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Provisional Roster: [https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW|https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW]

Same Player Docs modal as here: [https://zpl.io/bJWdJdD|https://zpl.io/bJWdJdD]

AC:

* Clicking on the Options Icon on a player's row, will launch the options menu, as depicted in the wire
* On the options menu, "Player Docs" will be an option
* Clicking a Player Docs will launch the upload modal
* You will be able to drag and drop file attachments to the modal
* You will be able to click Browse and open a file browser to attach files
* You will be able to attach multiple files
* There will be a trash can icon for each file attached
** Clicking the trash can will remove the file
* There will be a required label field for attached files
* Label option will be:
** PPA
** Other
* Labelâ€™s may be used more than once
* When a label has been added for all attached files, the Save Documents button will become active
* Clicking save documents will attach the files and commit changes, dismiss the modal, and return a green confirmation message
* Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm they wish to discard their changes
** If they confirm the decision, their changes will be discarded and the form will reload in view mode
** If they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.
* Uploaded docs will also be available on the playerâ€™s profile in the attached files section

title: As User, I want to see Eligible Players on the Available Player List
custom_steps:
*Wireframe(s):*

Available Players: [https://zpl.io/aMpJND7|https://zpl.io/aMpJND7]

h6. _Note: This story covers the section on the Qualifying Rosters tab and not the Rosters tab, as depicted in the wireframe.  Both tabs will have the same sections._



* The first section on the Qualifying Roster tab will be title Available and be collapsed by default
* The number of players on the available players list will show in the header
* There will be text indicating how many players can be added to the provision roster where the number of players is based on the provisional max limit for the qualifying tournament
* The section will contain all the selected Federations player's with an Eligibility Status of Approved
* BOC users will see a federation dropdown to switch between rosters
* Clicking on the players name should open the profile

title: Refactor Profile Structure / matching logic
custom_steps:
Tech debt story to represent the work that Zach H. is doing. 



Currently players are represented as a combination of player profile, player, and two mapping tables. Whenever a profile is created all of these must stay in sync in order to retain consistency in our data. This is slightly error-prone and can be refactored.

The goal is to go from 4 objects representing a player to having 1 table represent it. To do so weâ€™ll shift the models focus onto the Profile which we believe represents the basic unit at play in wbc.

Doing so, matching logic will be impacted and will have to change slightly.



AC:

* Everything continues to work as is
** Creating a new Player with and without matches
** Saving Player Profiles

title: As a BOC Admin I want to see the Federation Teams in alphabetical order after saving
custom_steps:
AC:
* On the Federation Teams tab display the teams in alphabetical order in both the Qualifier and Tournament section.
